website_summaries.verdict: With good specs at an even better price, the Acer Aspire VX 15 delivers respectable gaming performance that won't leave you feeling like you compromised.
pros: The Acer Aspire VX 15 is an attractive budget-friendly gaming laptop that's well configured for the money
You can easily add more memory and storage
It has an ample port assortment, including USB 3.1 Type-C
cons: The display is a little disappointing despite being an IPS panel
The base model has a smallish 256GB SSD that's filled with preinstalled software and apps

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Display Failure:
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop in April 2017 for work. It is now July 2017, and I am sad to say that the display seems to be failing on me already T___T. The display will flicker significantly when I go to open the laptop or tilt the screen in any way. Considering I bought the warranty through Amazon, I am thankful, but this is absolutely ridiculous a product I originally considered high quality is already failing after a couple of months of use.

customer_reviews.title: It can be upgraded easily. right off the bat it performs quite well
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what it is. It can be upgraded easily. right off the bat it performs quite well. The cooling fans keep in running just fine even in the desert. The screen isn't the best quality, but it does well in low light conditions. The keyboard is a saving grace since it lights up. Should have a CD-drive and a HDD drive included to improve its selling value to "older" customers. Also, other laptops of similar price come with the HDD already installed. Pretty solid book though. design is nice and robust. I don't feel like I'm going to break the thing just by toting it around for daily use.

customer_reviews.title: How to add a HDD to this laptop:
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is getting very bad reviews mostly because Acer is not including the cable and HDD bracket to add a HDD (which is basically necessary if you want to play games with it). To add one, you can buy the cable ( and use another laptop bracket to hold the HDD in position (I used one from an older Asus but my guess is that almost any bracket would fit). I hope that the pictures are self-explanatory on how to do this. ***UPDATE*** Just installed the HDD in the new kit that Acer sent me. It now sits beautifully and securely. Thank you for great customer support and for listening to us. 6 stars!!

customer_reviews.title: This Laptop is the best I've seen since I started considering buying a new ...
customer_reviews.text: This Laptop is the best I've seen since I started considering buying a new one last August. Its hits all the points: Fast start-up, great graphics (I mean really, it ran Warframe at 250 fps the first time i opened it. Had to set a limit lol), reasonable battery life (because nobody needs more than 6 hours unplugged, and gaming should only be done near a power source so it works out such that you're not paying for needless battery life) and its powerful (I ran all my games at once to test it, and between Minecraft, Overwatch, Warframe and Killer Instinct and it only lagged very slightly). I'm so glad I put off my first gaming PC until now!
